title: "Artificial Intelligence Discovers Plant-Sourced Peptides with Dramatic Effects on Muscle Strength and Recovery"
excerpt: "The results of the first study, carried out by Maastricht University under the supervision of Professor Luc Van Loon and published in the Journal of Nutrition, showed that the intelligent ingredient unlocked from the fava bean using cutting-edge technology performs better than traditional animal proteins – specifically milk protein – when it comes to muscle protein synthesis."
